page.title: 16Interview
page.content: How longe have you lived in this area? I have lived here since 1934. Has the area changed much? Not to much,but the Tunnel Cement is a big difference.It started in the early 50's. Could you explain the radio towers? They were built late 1939.There's two of them.There's also a lookout post on the hill. Did you ever see any german planes? There were lots of them every night , also bombs were dropped. Can you explain the bunker system? They were built with the radio towers to protect us from the bombing. What are you doing on the farm this present day? Now I am a quite succesful dairy farmer.I own a farm of 80 acres.Now whenever I want anything I go down to the village of Penyffordd.
